labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Attempts to edit the latest message in the channel, wiping all unsaved changes, does nothing if you have text in the prompt or crashes the client
data.expected_result: It to go up in the text in the current edit prompt or go up in menus/selectors
data.short_description: Up-arrow attempts to edit last message no matter what is selected
data.steps_to_repro: - Be attempting to edit a message that wasn't your latest or be doing anything in the list belowPossible locations:Edits: User Settings, Server Settings, Channel Settings, RTC Debug, User Popout, Full Profile, Viewing Channel Topic, Other messages being edited, Some context menusCrashes: Search Bar - Hit the Up arrow key
